bug.author: abdulsalama
bug.summary: Cannot logout from kubeflow dashboard UI
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I used kubeflow with istio_dex for authentication. User can authenticate and log-in fine. However, I don't see anyway to logout. Clicking on the user profile icon on right side does nothing. The only work-around is to explicitly delete the cookie. What did you expect to happen: User can log out by clicking the user profile icon on the top right side. Anything else you would like to add: N/A Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): dev_local kfctl version: v1.0-0-g94c35cf Kubernetes platform: eks Kubernetes version: Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"17", GitVersion:"v1.17.3", GitCommit:"06ad960bfd03b39c8310aaf92d1e7c12ce618213", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2020-02-11T18:14:22Z", GoVersion:"go1.13.6", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"} OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): macOS Catalina 10.15.4
